resources.string: Thank you for registering on our SmartDesk application. You will soon receive an email with an access token and with all the details needed for logging in myEndava Application.\nWe hope that you will find all the needed information there and that you will have a great time at our company!
Please enter the authentication code that we provided on your email address.

By filling out this form and clicking continue, you will be taken to the registration form and all your data will be prepopulated. Please verify that all information is correct before submitting the registration form.
By filling out this form and clicking register, you agree to our privacy policy.
In order to have an easier and faster registration, please us the authentication code that you received on your email.
Enter your personal details and start the journey with us.
